text: “E inu amene mwakhulupirira! Lapani kwa Allah; kulapa koona; ndithu Mbuye wanu akufafanizirani zoipa zanu ndi kukakulowetsani m’minda momwe mitsinje ikuyenda pansi pake, tsiku limene Allah sadzayalutsa mneneli ndi amene adakhulupirira pamodzi naye. Dangalira lawo lidzayenda chapatsogolo pawo ndi mbali yakumanja kwawo, uku akunena: “Mbuye wathu! Tikwanitsireni dangalira lathu (mpaka likatifikitse ku Munda wamtendere), ndiponso tikhululukireni ndithu Inu ndi Wokhoza chilichonse.”
